title: Am i the only one?
body: This is a rhetorical question but am I the only one who is sick of being punished with a 5 min lockout because of not wanting to have to play with a team that Instalocks or announces they will feed. I know Riot trys its best and is always working hard and the games great but the community needs to be improved drastically before I can find the game tolerable to solo queu.

replies.body: 5 minutes isn't that long, and they can't have no pentalty because then people will dodge all the time. But I do think they should have a mini-surrender in champion select, where 4 people on one team can vote to be re-matched.
You shouldn't leave games, it is as simple as that.
